title: PBE Error: 500 · Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.
body:
Whenever I try to signup for PBE, even with a VPN, like cyberghost, still isn't loading. It gives me this: Error: 500 ·
 Something’s gone hextechnically wrong. Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem. I also tried euw server. That doesn't work.

replies.body: The issue is appearing again for me
Is there any other VPNs that anyone can state instead of cyberghost or hotspot shield?
i'm in euw and i have this problem too. I want to look my PBE status please help.

This is a known issue with the page, so, unfortunately, if the VPN doesn't work, there's nothing else that can be done to access the page right now. I don't have an ETA to provide you on when you'll see the fix for this go out, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
